name: Chroma-Sprinter
description:
The first world of a speed-based platformer I'm gonna spend a lot of time on. Much of the art (the Death Smoke in particular) is placeholder but I wanna go with the mysterious black and white aesthetic.

Use WASD or arrow keys to control your character, and press R to restart a level. Try to get through the first 10 levels.

If the music bugs I'm really sorry, but I'm not sure how to fix it yet.

This is my first """""full""""" project and I'm happy with it, I think it's fun and the fastfall and overall speed offers a fun skill cap. Now with level timer! I plan to adjust the levels to make them more intuitive and visually pleasing as time goes on.

There are bugs with the music on Safari, and some small bugs with the controls I'm trying to sort out. Sorry.
